Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the award of reasonable attorney's fees in certain proceedings
Summary: Provides for the award of reasonable attorneys' fees in FOIL proceedings if the person is successful and in open meeting proceedings to the successful petitioner and against the public body.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the award of reasonable attorneys' fees in certain proceedings
